title: zero mecha sion or mecha zero sion
body:
the lastest post on news for league is to do with the three mecha skins{{champion:266}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:121}}  now on pbe news and surrender@20 there was a small talk about it 

now people will make fun of me but i main and love sion plz bring another skin out on him so i can owe them all thanks
